author: TimCurwick
body:
Fix ConvertTo-Html single matched column header bug
Add ConvertTo-Html pester tests for single matched column header bug

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@TimCurwick**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: TimCurwick
comments.body:
Fixes issue #2185 
There were no tests for ConvertTo-Html. I added a test file with two tests specific to the modified behavior. I presume Microsoft has other, existing tests for ConvertTo-Html that can and should also be run before merging.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan Please take a look. This fix is specific to Windows PowerShell (full CLR) because the cmdlet has not yet been ported to CoreCLR.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @TimCurwick please fix the two small comments in the tests. Rest looks good.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @TimCurwick could you please address the 2 comments and rebase your commits? `ConvertTo-Html` has been enabled in powershell core.

comments.author: TimCurwick
comments.body: Sorry about the delay. I was on vacation and then busy with the Summit. Airports are great for catching up on work. :)

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @TimCurwick Seems that there are merge conflicts in test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/ConvertTo-Html.Tests.ps1. Could you resolve those please?

comments.author: chunqingchen
comments.body: please resolve the build conflict. It's still there

comments.author: mirichmo
mi-hol
comments.body:
@TimCurwick are you planning to implemented the requested changes?

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: I replaced this PR with PR #4276

title: Fix ConvertTo-Html single matched column header bug
